item.title: Altice 向债权人提供最高 15%的股份以换取减值
item.description: 法国奥迪斯公司（Altice France）提出了一项建议，让有担保债权人持有公司股份，以促使他们同意减持股份，因为这家陷入困境的电信巨头正试图削减 244 亿欧元（约合 267 亿美元）的债务。【原文：Altice France is floating a proposal to give secured creditors a stake in the company to get them to agree to a haircut on their holdings, as the embattled telecommunications giant seeks to whittle away at its €24.4 billion ($26.7 billion) of debt.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的政治掮客萨拉梅即将入狱
item.description: Ryan Salame 是山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）在 FTX 的得力助手之一，因在欺诈性加密货币交易所工作期间犯下的罪行，他的刑期即将开始。【原文：Ryan Salame, one of Sam Bankman-Fried’s top lieutenants at FTX, is running out of road as the start of his jail term looms for crimes committed while working at the fraudulent cryptocurrency exchange.】

item.title: 贝莱德、GIC 将投资现代汽车印度公司 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. and Singaporean sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte are among those that have made bids to buy stock in Hyundai Motor India Ltd.’s $3.3 billion initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 飓风米尔顿导致数百万人停电，航班受阻
item.description: 飓风米尔顿周三晚些时候在佛罗里达州萨拉索塔附近咆哮登陆，导致 300 多万用户断电，并引发大面积洪灾。但官员们谨慎乐观地表示，损失不会达到 2022 年飓风伊恩造成的程度。【原文：Hurricane Milton roared ashore in Florida near Sarasota late Wednesday knocking out power to more than 3 million customers and causing widespread flooding. But officials were cautiously optimistic that damage won’t reach the level wrought by Hurricane Ian in 2022.】

item.title: 捷克中央银行提高银行最低准备金要求
item.description: 捷克中央银行提高了银行业的最低准备金要求，以降低其成本。【原文：The Czech central bank increased the minimum reserve requirement for the banking industry to reduce its costs.】

item.title: 投资持续低迷，法国消费者助力经济增长
item.description: 法国统计局（Insee）表示，由于消费支出的复苏有助于抵消投资的持续下滑，法国经济今年将增长1.1%。【原文：The French economy will grow 1.1% this year as a recovery in consumer spending helps to offset a continued decline in investment, statistics agency Insee said.】

item.title: 据说哥伦比亚 Ecopetrol 公司将推迟 17.5 亿美元的债券销售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在哥伦比亚选举委员会对该国总统和这家国营石油钻探公司的首席执行官展开调查之后，Ecopetrol SA 公司推迟了出售 17.5 亿美元美元债券的提议。【原文：Ecopetrol SA postponed an offer to sell $1.75 billion of dollar bonds after Colombia’s electoral council launched an investigation involving the nation’s president and the state oil driller’s chief executive officer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Covid-Shot 制造商在落后于辉瑞和 Moderna 之后破产
item.description: Gritstone Bio Inc.是一家疫苗开发商，曾标榜自己有能力生产下一代Covid-19疫苗，周四在特拉华州申请破产保护。【原文：Gritstone Bio Inc., a vaccine developer that once touted its ability to make a next-generation Covid-19 shot, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Delaware Thursday.】

item.title: 红杉投资德国武器化无人机初创公司 Stark Defense
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，美国风险投资公司红杉资本投资了一家开发自主攻击无人机的德国初创公司。【原文：US venture capital firm Sequoia Capital invested in a German startup developing autonomous attack drones, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 私人信贷创纪录的季度业绩掩盖了交易缩减的担忧
item.description: 对私人信贷放贷机构来说，好消息是：他们正在进行数量创纪录的交易。坏消息是：不断增加的交易量并没有给他们带来最梦寐以求的十亿美元交易。【原文：The good news for private credit lenders: they’re getting to work on a record number of deals. The bad news: rising dealflow hasn’t brought them the billion-dollar deals they covet most.】

item.title: 简街公司在印度创纪录的利润使千年之战更加复杂
item.description: 简街集团利润飙升，成为其与两名前交易员和千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）就他们涉嫌窃取价值十亿美元的印度期权交易秘密策略而展开的法律战的焦点。【原文：Jane Street Group’s soaring profits have emerged as a focal point in its legal battle with two ex-traders and Millennium Management over their alleged theft of a secret billion-dollar India options trading strategy.】

item.title: 大型银行准备在财报后增发数十亿美元债券
item.description: 华尔街银行在公布季度业绩后，预计将利用超低的信贷息差和投资者的强劲需求，最快在下周推出一系列债券销售活动。【原文：Wall Street banks are expected to launch a barrage of bond sales as soon as next week, capitalizing on ultra-low credit spreads and strong demand from investors after they report quarterly results.】

item.title: Northvolt 的电池制造热潮在瑞典北部逐渐消退
item.description: 瑞典电池生产商 Northvolt AB 公司的危机波及该国北部的各个社区，未付账单和被取消的项目威胁着供应商和工薪阶层的生计。【原文：The crisis at Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB is rippling through communities in the north of the country, where unpaid bills and scrapped projects threaten the livelihoods of suppliers and wage earners alike.】

item.title: 土耳其将放宽通胀核算规则以保护投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的官员透露，土耳其政府计划放宽通货膨胀会计规则，将资本支出免于计算。【原文：The Turkish government plans to ease inflation accounting rules by exempting capital expenditures from calculations, according to officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 债券交易员加大对美联储 11 月降息四分之一点的押注
item.description: 由于申请失业救济人数的急剧上升压倒了高于预期的通胀数据，债券投资者提高了对美联储下月将降息四分之一点的押注。【原文：Bond investors lifted wagers that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by a quarter point next month as a sharp rise in claims for unemployment took precedence over a hotter-than-expected inflation print.】

item.title: 世贸组织称货物贸易前景暗淡，风险不断增加
item.description: 世界贸易组织表示，2025 年全球货物贸易的增长将低于最初的预测，因为日益加剧的不稳定性对经济活动造成了压力，并有可能扰乱航运。【原文：Global goods trade in 2025 will grow less then initially forecast, the World Trade Organization said, as rising instability weighs on economic activity and threatens to disrupt shipping.】

item.title: 瑞典网上药店 Apotea 据说考虑 3 亿美元首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞典网上药店 Apotea AB 正在考虑最快于今年在瑞典进行首次公开募股。【原文：Swedish online pharmacy Apotea AB is considering an initial public offering in Sweden as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数跃升至一年新高，部分原因是受海伦影响
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周增至一年多来的最高值，反映出密歇根州以及受飓风海伦影响的各州申请人数大幅增加。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose last week to the highest in over a year, reflecting large increases in Michigan, as well as states affected by Hurricane Helene.】

item.title: 埃克森公司获准在得克萨斯州建造美国最大的近海碳封存场地
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司赢得了在墨西哥湾得克萨斯州水域下抽取二氧化碳的权利，这将是美国同类产品中最大的特许权。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. won the right to pump carbon dioxide beneath Texas state waters in the Gulf of Mexico, in what will be the largest concession of its kind in the US.】

item.title: 拉坦-塔塔在价值 1650 亿美元企业集团高层职位的热门人选
item.description: 未来几天，塔塔信托（间接控制塔塔集团的慈善团体）将承担挑选拉坦-塔塔继任者的重要任务，而这位继任者将对这个价值 1,650 亿美元、遍布 100 个国家的商业帝国产生巨大影响。【原文：In the coming days, Tata Trusts, a collective of charities that indirectly controls the Tata Group, will have the crucial task of picking Ratan Tata’s successor — someone who’ll wield massive influence over a $165 billion business empire spread across 100 countries.】

item.title: 美国将非洲核电的胜利寄托于技术，加纳正在权衡各种选择
item.description: 上个月，美国击败俄罗斯，获得了加纳首个小型模块化核反应堆的建造权。在华盛顿看来，尽管西非国家对未来的选择持开放态度，但在这笔交易中，美国的技术比更便宜的资金更受青睐。【原文：The US beat out Russia last month to build Ghana’s first small modular nuclear reactor, in a deal Washington sees as prizing its technology over cheaper financing even as the West African nation keeps future options open.】

item.title: 散户资金持续流入，印度股票基金获得创纪录的 30 亿美元收益
item.description: 流入印度股票共同基金的散户资金洪流丝毫没有减弱的迹象。【原文：The torrent of retail funds flowing into India’s equity mutual funds shows no signs of abating.】

item.title: ION 分析部门首席执行官 Jody Drulard 已离职
item.description: ION 集团分析部门的首席执行官已经离职，这是由意大利大亨 Andrea Pignataro 创立的金融科技集团一系列管理层变动中的最新一次。【原文：The chief executive officer of ION Group’s Analytics unit has left the company, the latest in a series of management changes in the fintech group founded by the Italian tycoon Andrea Pignataro.】

item.title: 欧洲糖企利润因供应强劲而下滑
item.description: 欧洲糖业公司在去年取得辉煌业绩后，正面临着收入压力，因为供应量增加导致价格下降，损害了他们的底线。【原文：Europe’s sugar companies are facing revenue pressures, after last year’s stellar performance, as increased supplies are pushing down prices and hurting their bottom line.】

item.title: 加纳欧洲债券退出违约，向投资者发行新债券
item.description: 加纳向投资者发行了新债券，以换取现有债券，结束了漫长的重组过程，目的是使其在国际货币基金组织计划下的贷款更具可持续性。【原文：Ghana issued new bonds to investors in exchange for existing ones, concluding a lengthy restructuring process aimed at making its loans more sustainable under an International Monetary Fund program.】

item.title: 摩根大通称墨西哥比索易受 "不可预测 "的美国投票影响
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）下调了长期看涨墨西哥比索的看涨看盘，警告交易商应注意 "极难预测的 "美国总统大选带来的风险。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. cut a long-standing bullish call on the Mexican peso, warning traders should be mindful of risks stemming from a “highly-unpredictable” US presidential election.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰将购买 20 亿美元金融科技新贵的消费贷款
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一份声明称，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. has agreed to buy up to $2 billion of consumer installment loans from financial technology lender Upstart Holdings Inc. as part of an effort to push into asset-based finance, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司获得美国许可证以偿还委内瑞拉债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，康菲石油公司已获得美国政府颁发的一系列许可证，使这家石油和天然气生产商能够更好地收回委内瑞拉十多年前扣押并国有化其资产后拖欠的部分或全部约 100 亿美元债务。【原文：ConocoPhillips has been granted a string of licenses by the US government that allow the oil and gas producer to better position itself to recover some or all of the roughly $10 billion it is owed by Venezuela after the country seized and nationalized its assets more than a decade ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】
